document_data.name: Montgomery
document_data.mainbody: '''Montgomery''' was a family man commoner inhabitant of the [[Baldur's Gate/Rivington|Rivington]] neighborhood of [[Baldur's Gate]]  in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Montgomery was a [[human]] man with dark brown skin, brown eyes, and black hair of fine curls. He wore a well-trimmed beard and a commoner's jerkin atop a blue tunic.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Montgomery took his son to see the famed [[Dribbles]] the clown of the [[Circus of the Last Days]]. In lieu of recently surging murders and violent crimes in Baldur's Gate, the circus assigned the Principal Sniffer [[ghoul]] named [[Benji (ghoul)|Benji]] to sniff out blood on every guest entering the circus. The ghoul was supervised by [[Klaus]], the Assistant Sniffer, who allowed patrons through the locked gates. Montgomery and his son both were clean, the boy was terrified of the blood-covered [[jester]] ghoul and refused to enter the circus.
